definitions.definition: To review , alter and amend , especially of written material.
To look over again (something previously written or learned), especially in preparation for an examination .
examples: I've only just begun to revise for my exams.

definitions.definition: To look at again, to reflect on.

main_definition: To review , alter and amend , especially of written material.
secondary_definitions: ( UK , Australia , New Zealand ) To look over again (something previously written or learned), especially in preparation for an examination .
( obsolete ) To look at again, to reflect on.
